attributes.action: remove all the recent changes made in the name of political correctness
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Changes to the British way of speaking such as the nursery rhyme baa baa black sheep to rainbow sheep and calling a black board a chalk board and a white board a pen board. The political correctness in England has gone way over the top. 

These items and rhymes have existed for a very long time and I can not understand how the description of a board or of a sheep can be classed as something insulting to a person who is coloured.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
